name: Mindrack Tower Defence
description:
This is one of the first games I ever did in Python, and it's bad, like, terribad.

The idea was to make a tower defence game on the theme of Mindrack, a Minecraft community. The game would be my cakeday gift to people on Reddit.

I really underestimated the amount of work and maths you need to make a balanced tower defence game. I spent dozens of hours testing and tweaking and testing again. I just wanted it to be over by the end of it. :P

It was a fun experience though.
